text: [music playing]

ANDY SCHOLES: The Cleveland
Cavaliers' JR Smith, well he's

Instagrammed a touching image
of himself holding his daughter
Dakota for the very first time.

Smith and his wife
Jewel announced

last month that Dakota had been
born five months premature.
- Wow.
She weighed just one pound.
- Wow.

ANDY SCHOLES: Dakota now,
though, over a month old.

And the image was
shared with the caption,

"Today is one of the
greatest days of my life.

Today I get to hold my
youngest for the first time.
God is great. #DakotaStrong.
- Wow, she's so tiny.

ANDY SCHOLES: It's
amazing how tiny she was.
- Yeah.
[music playing]

JEWEL HARRIS: We know we're
not the only family going

through this, who has
been through this,
and who will ever go through it.

That's why we decided
to share what we're
going through with you guys.
Please keep us in your prayers.
